name: Caramel Crunch
description:
What you should know:
* "Time for Change": Seconds remaining to change the forbidden color (DONT TOUCH)

* "Crunch" automatically appears the last 3 seconds of the "time change" and will destroy the forbidden colors to add 1 second to the "Playtime".

* "Game Time" and "3 Lives": If they reach 0 the game ends.

The game has 3 difficulties.
